item.title: Visual Representation Basics II
item.description: Contents Slides Lab 3: Make a plot (ggplot2) Tweet of the Day Slides Download the slides from today‚Äôs lecture. Jenny Bryan‚Äôs ggplot2 tutorial GitHub / slides Allison Hill‚Äôs Data Visualization in the Tidyverse The Great Tidy Plot Off Make your own animated plots with gganimate Lab 3: Make a plot (ggplot2) Go to our healy-dataviz project and open ‚Äú04_show_the_right_numbers.Rmd‚Äù. This covers Chapter 4: Show the right numbers in Kieran Healy, Data Visualization Kieran Healy, Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction (Princeton: Princeton University Press, 2018), http://socviz.

item.title: Introduction to Visual Analytics
item.description: Contents Slides & Lab Tweet of the day: Slides & Lab Introduction to Visual Analytics Click on the slides and press ‚ÄúF‚Äù to make it into full-screen. Press ‚ÄúESC‚Äù to exit from full-screen. Lab: Intro to R/RStudio and RMarkdown Create a RStudio.Cloud account rstudio.cloud. Go to our class‚Äô RStudio.Cloud workspace. Open healy-dataviz. Our first exercise will be running Chapter 2: Get started in Kieran Healy, Data Visualization Kieran Healy, Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction (Princeton: Princeton University Press, 2018), http://socviz.
